definitions.definition: a flat area on a golf course from which players hit the ball

examples.text: to drive off from the first tee

definitions.definition: a small piece of plastic or wood that you stick in the ground to support a golf ball before you hit it

examples.text: She wore jeans and a plain white tee.

definitions.definition: used to say that something is exactly right for somebody, succeeds in doing something in exactly the right way, etc.

examples.text: Her new job suits her to a T.
The novel captures the feeling of the pre-war period to a T.
